MdlExample.Title: Polygon Boolean Example

MdlExample.Name: TriangulateContours
MdlExample.Title: Triangulate Contours Example
MdlExample.Comments: The function myTriangulateContours (at bottom) triangulates polylines, e.g., from stroked topographical contours. Though the triangulation is performed in the xy-plane, the z-coordinates are preserved.
Some functions in the bsibasegeom library are used. Also used are the vertex, face and graph traversal macros discussed in the "VU Loops" section of ~s"Vertex Use Graphs".
